title: Dolce Gusto Timer Free
summary: Help in preparing their beverages Dolce Gusto.
developerAddress:
Rua Edson Castro Duarte, 171 - Anchieta
Santa Rita do Sapucaí - MG - 37540-000
description: The Dolce Gusto Timer application helps in the preparation of Dolce Gusto beverages in non-automatic machines indicating switching off the machine according to the chosen beverage using an audible alarm and vibrating the device.Also includes records of beverages to control their personal stock of capsules, with the option to warn when the capsules are finished. It has a control as being the preparation of beverages and monthly historical recent months.You can choose which dish will be prepared, just tap on the desired capsule: 1 or 2. Now you can cancel the timer and restart counting. Option of preparing the beverage using the level indicated in the capsule.To access all the beverages get the full version.The trademark “DOLCE GUSTO” is a registered trademark of Société des Produits Nestlé S.A.. Dolce Gusto Timer is not an official application and its developer is not associated with any Nestlé-affiliated company nor it is an authorized retailer of Nestlé products or services.Special thanks:- George D. Flamouris (greek translation);- Jeroen Stikkers (dutch translation);- Ronni Johansson (danish translation);- Stefania Falleni (italian translation).
descriptionHTML:
The Dolce Gusto Timer application helps in the preparation of Dolce Gusto beverages in non-automatic machines indicating switching off the machine according to the chosen beverage using an audible alarm and vibrating the device.
Also includes records of beverages to control their personal stock of capsules, with the option to warn when the capsules are finished. It has a control as being the preparation of beverages and monthly historical recent months.
You can choose which dish will be prepared, just tap on the desired capsule: 1 or 2. Now you can cancel the timer and restart counting.
Option of preparing the beverage using the level indicated in the capsule.

To access all the beverages get the full version.

The trademark “DOLCE GUSTO” is a registered trademark of Société des Produits Nestlé S.A.. Dolce Gusto Timer is not an official application and its developer is not associated with any Nestlé-affiliated company nor it is an authorized retailer of Nestlé products or services.

Special thanks:

- George D. Flamouris (greek translation);
- Jeroen Stikkers (dutch translation);
- Ronni Johansson (danish translation);
- Stefania Falleni (italian translation).
comments: Easy to use, fun and especially like the usage chart to track the different beverage varieties you've created for month.   Need to fix the "Espresso" option please as it doesn't allow you to bookmark this particular one! No issues with bookmarking any of the other flavours.
Stupid qn perhaps but do we start the timer the moment we push the start button, or the precise moment coffee begins to flow from the machine? Please clear this up for us. Thank you
Luv my Jovia only negative is not all varieties available in New Zealand have to purchase ones like Caramel M on ebay
Looks good, tastes good.  Plenty of varieties.... look out for bargain pods in outlets like Poundland.  The drinks timer app is excellent too.
Sirve para lo que esta diseñado, se pega cuando el telefono se bloquea, pero cumple su función.
A brilliant app easy to use  ☕ love my new nescafe dolce gusto ☕
recentChanges: Beverages times greater than 200ml were corrected.
Times are based on the size of each capsule. If you find it more convenient, you can also use the timer by level, which follows the time recommended by the manufacturer.
